website_summaries.verdict: Probably the most gentle sponge we saw. A good cleanser, but don't expect it to do much exfoliating.
pros: Winner of Allure magazine's Best Beauty award
Gentle enough for daily use around the delicate eye area

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I’d seen these sponges advertised by another vendor but, with shipping and handling, thought the cost a bit too much to try. However, that changed when I found them on Amazon. I have a mild case of rosacea and have to be careful with what I use on my skin. I am very impressed with this product and am very glad I ordered it as a subscription. After the first use, my skin was smoother and the redness on my cheeks and forehead was markedly decrease. I’m very, very satisfied and will be recommending them to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gentle Exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got this, I've been in love with it! It's soft on the skin, yet still offers enough vigor to get the job done. This particular sponge in Julep' s line helps to thoroughly clear out pores and, in turn, reduce the perceived size of them in addition to having antimicrobial properties, making it great for acne. As someone who has enlarged pores from makeup usage and acne prone skin, I've seen massive improvement in the quality of my skin, which is now smoother and softer. I would highly recommend this product if you have any of the following: -Large pores -Sensitive skin -Heavy product buildup -Acne prone skin
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Soft yet effective exfoliating sponge. Works well with my cleanser (Philosophy’S Purity Made Simple). It does take a few moments each use to soften up but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. this is my second one of these and i will continue to buy them until the day i die. i’ve never seen such an improvement in my skin and it’s so simple and it makes washing my face easier & it’s cute & i just love it. please buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best sponge ever! I cant count how many I've bought but my complexion is so much better since I've started using this about 2 years ago. So sad ulta stopped selling them but thank God for amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Keturah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well, I used it with a julep face wash and my face always felt so smooth and was glowing after I would use this. It has a suction cup so I assumed you could just hang it in the shower, that’s what I did and it ended up drying and shrinking really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Augaddy1213

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time! Love this face sponge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a family favorite. This sponge lasts a long time. And I think it's helped improve the texture of our faces, from mom and dad to acne-prone teens. One sponge lasts for months!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley J. Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Dewy glo up❣️❣️
customer_reviews.text: The best ting ever❣️❣️ I feel flawless and glowy like a ig baddie/ k idol model ..lol. You can really see the quality in these products. As a person of color and with sensitive skin ..this has been amazing 😉! Forever my new beauty reg!
customer_reviews.author: StoA

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: It’s smooth. It does no scrubbing at all. My hands clean my face better.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know why I bought this. It was a waste of money. No razzle dazzle to it. Just a sponge
customer_reviews.author: Brinae

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really love my julep products the sponge is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing the daily buildup and leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this for all the attributes- it works really well
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M LoRusso

customer_reviews.title: Not worth anything. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing. No exfoliating. Feels slimy. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel A.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is super gentle on the skin, and I have sensitive skin. I use this every day and have noticed clearer, brighter skin after using this to gently clean my face each night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: received  a used product. Gross
customer_reviews.text: Product was wet and used when I received it sealed
customer_reviews.author: astronaught

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these facial cleansing sponges....I use them daily to keep my face exfoliated and looking fresh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this is so great, I will stick to using my rag and face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face as soft as a baby’s bottom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best facial product I’ve bought in a long time and totally natural!!!
customer_reviews.author: Niel Sandfort

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. No face scrub necessary, light exfoliation and calmed my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - gentle exfoliation.
customer_reviews.text: Great for gently exfoliating dead skin away. Is not rough at all, but seems to be effective. I don't use physical exfoliation often, but when I do I don't want to shred and irritate my skin. This does the trick. Does seem to break down quick because of the stubble I keep on my face. Nice perk - comes with suction cup for hanging it up to dry!
customer_reviews.author: SupKarma

customer_reviews.title: Will not irritate the skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this sponge from julep... With the cleanser or without this works for me! I've had bad acne since I was a teen, so when I discovered the brand and this sponge it changed my life! It's not rough and will not irritate the skin. I use it morning and at night before I go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sponge. Someone recommended it to me, and I almost ignored them because I don’t typically use sponges for cleansing. I’m so glad I have it a try. I’ve been using it for a week and love the way my skin looks and feels.
customer_reviews.author: W.T. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Love these sponges... very effective at cleaning off makeup. Does the trick VERY well and exfoliates at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: A handy mini facial every day
customer_reviews.text: This sponge is the perfect sponge to use on your face. It gently exfoliates leaving skin smooth without irritating it. Use with or without soap. Make sure to rinse it out well, squeeze out the excess water and hang it somewhere where it will air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle Exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I use them in the morning with Julep's face oil. It is a lovely way to remove dead skin and start the day with clean skin for applying moisturizer. The only downside is they last about two months and then begin to disintegrate.
customer_reviews.author: Glensidegirl

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this everyday and it feels so nice and exfoliates well. I also love the fact that this can softly remove any masks that I put on my face as well. I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This konjac sponge is my secret weapon for keeping my skin soft and exfoliated when I’m traveling. It’s a very gentle exfoliant, so if you have sensitive skin that usually doesn’t take well to physical exfoliation this is absolutely worth a try. After I use it, my skin looks calm, feels clean, and is ready for the rest of my skincare regimen. Bonus for exfoliation: a smooth canvas for makeup application!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing ever! My face feels so much cleaner than just using my fingers. The little string is genius to keep it from sitting in a damp puddle.
customer_reviews.author: Ren2511

customer_reviews.title: Great sponge and  fantastic value!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sponge It really has change my skin a lot I’m going to be 53 and within the last two weeks that I’ve had it my skin has improved 100% I also have the little container that holds it so it won’t get mildewy or yucky Julep products are fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen King

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I use this with my bare face ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use this with my bare face oil or the bare face stick. It does come wet so don't be surprised about that. I keep mine in the shower ready to use at the end of the day to take off all my make up. I find mine lasts about 3 months with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: After using it a couple of times, it made me break out so I stopped and won’t use it again
customer_reviews.author: AT

product_meta.title: Julep All-Natural Charcoal Konjac Sponge (Face)
product_meta.description:
Design:FaceWho says exfoliating has to be harsh for your skin? This super-soft, all-natural facial exfoliating sponge is made from the fibrous root of the Konjac plant and enriched with skin-clarifying charcoal. Use daily to unveil a smooth canvas for makeup and improve the efficacy of your skincare products. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, acne prone, and dry skin. Gentle enough to use morning and night, alone or with your favorite cleanser. This super gentle exfoliator removes dry, dead skin. Rinse with warm water before and after each use. Unlike chemical exfoliators, our Konjac sponge is gentle enough to use around the delicate eye area.

1
We believe that every day is a chance to Brave Pretty. Whether it’s rocking a bold lip or showing off your barefaced glow, it’s about stepping out of your comfort zone, trying new things, and connecting with girlfriends.
feature_bullets: Gently Exfloiate and Detoxify with a Konjac Root and Charcoal Sponge
Use Daily to Unveil a Smooth Canvas for Makeup and Enhance Your Skincare Routine
Comes with a Suction Cup Hook for Easy Shower Storage. Sponge Will Arrive Damp.
Rinse Under Warm Water Before Each Use
